Christopher Cowell

Cowell Technical Training is the natural, obvious way to pair Chris's two loves of teaching and programming. Teaching career started at 14. Taught philosophy to undergraduates. Taught adults to read in as a VISTA/AmeriCorps volunteer in Lansing, Michigan. More goes here.
